
<table cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0"><tbody><tr><td class="t_f" id="postmessage_52347172">
众所周知，目前deepseek官网的服务器经常用不了，不过如今部分大厂都部署了deepseek<br>
<font face="Tahoma, &amp;quot">以下是汇总到的一些使用渠道：</font><br>
<br>
<font face="Tahoma, &amp;quot">1. 秘塔搜索：</font><font face="Tahoma, &amp;quot">https://metaso.cn</font><font face="Tahoma, &amp;quot">&nbsp;&nbsp;</font><br>
<font face="Tahoma, &amp;quot">2. 360纳米AI搜索：</font><font face="Tahoma, &amp;quot">https://www.n.cn/</font><font face="Tahoma, &amp;quot">&nbsp;&nbsp;</font><br>
<font face="Tahoma, &amp;quot">3. 硅基流动：</font><font face="Tahoma, &amp;quot">https://cloud.siliconflow.cn/</font><br>
<font face="Tahoma, &amp;quot">4. 字节跳动火山引擎：</font><font face="Tahoma, &amp;quot">https://console.volcengine.com/a ... -beijing/experience</font><font face="Tahoma, &amp;quot">&nbsp;&nbsp;</font><br>
<font face="Tahoma, &amp;quot">5. 百度云千帆：</font><font face="Tahoma, &amp;quot">https://console.bce.baidu.com/qi ... /model/buildIn/list</font><font face="Tahoma, &amp;quot">&nbsp;&nbsp;</font><br>
<font face="Tahoma, &amp;quot">6. 英伟达NIM：</font><font face="Tahoma, &amp;quot">https://build.nvidia.com/deepseek-ai/deepseek-r1</font><font face="Tahoma, &amp;quot">&nbsp;&nbsp;</font><br>
<font face="Tahoma, &amp;quot">7. Groq：</font><font face="Tahoma, &amp;quot">https://groq.com/</font><font face="Tahoma, &amp;quot">&nbsp;&nbsp;</font><br>
<font face="Tahoma, &amp;quot">8. Fireworks：</font><font face="Tahoma, &amp;quot">https://fireworks.ai/models/fireworks/deepseek-r1</font><font face="Tahoma, &amp;quot">&nbsp;&nbsp;</font><br>
<font face="Tahoma, &amp;quot">9. Chutes：</font><font face="Tahoma, &amp;quot">https://chutes.ai/app/chute/</font><font face="Tahoma, &amp;quot">&nbsp;&nbsp;</font><br>
<font face="Tahoma, &amp;quot">10. Github：</font><font face="Tahoma, &amp;quot">https://github.com/marketplace/m ... pSeek-R1/playground</font><br>
<font face="Tahoma, &amp;quot">11. POE：</font><font face="Tahoma, &amp;quot">https://poe.com/DeepSeek-R1</font><br>
<font face="Tahoma, &amp;quot">12. Cursor：</font><font face="Tahoma, &amp;quot">https://www.cursor.com/</font><font face="Tahoma, &amp;quot">&nbsp;&nbsp;</font><br>
<font face="Tahoma, &amp;quot">13. Monica：</font><font face="Tahoma, &amp;quot">https://monica.im/</font><br>
<font face="Tahoma, &amp;quot">14. Lambda：</font><font face="Tahoma, &amp;quot">https://lambdalabs.com/</font><br>
<font face="Tahoma, &amp;quot">15. Cerebras：</font><font face="Tahoma, &amp;quot">https://cerebras.ai</font><br>
<font face="Tahoma, &amp;quot">16. Perplexity：</font><font face="Tahoma, &amp;quot">https://www.perplexity.ai</font><br>
<font face="Tahoma, &amp;quot">17. 阿里云百炼：</font><font face="Tahoma, &amp;quot">https://api.together.ai/playground/chat/deepseek-ai/DeepSeek-R1</font><font face="Tahoma, &amp;quot">&nbsp;&nbsp;</font><br>
